title: Josie and the Pussycats
creator_credit: Marc Platt Productions, Universal Pictures, Riverdale Productions, Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, Jasna Stefanovic, Deborah Kaplan, Harry Elfont, Syd Dutton, Tony DeRosa-Grund, Leesa Evans, Marc Platt, Tracey E. Edmonds and Chuck Grimes
headline_credit: Canada and United States of America, 2001
brief_description: Josie, Melody and Val are three small-town girl musicians determined to take their rock band out of their garage and straight to the top, while remaining true to their look, style and sound.

constellations_other.name: Conflict to cartoons
constellations_other.description: The Bell and Howell Filmo 70DR was a durable, 16mm camera frequently used by combat photographers like Robert Capa during the Spanish Civil War and Australian Neil Davis in the Vietnam War, but this Constellation goes to some much brighter places.

creator_credit_for_label: Marc Platt Productions, Universal Pictures, Riverdale Productions, Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, Jasna Stefanovic, Deborah Kaplan, Harry Elfont, Syd Dutton, Tony DeRosa-Grund, Leesa Evans, Marc Platt, Tracey E. Edmonds and Chuck Grimes
description: Josie, Melody and Val are three small-town girl musicians determined to take their rock band out of their garage and straight to the top, while remaining true to their look, style and sound. They get a record deal which brings fame and fortune but soon realize they are pawns of two people who want to control the youth of America. They must clear their names, even if it means losing fame and fortune.
description_for_label: Josie, Melody and Val are three small-town girl musicians determined to take their rock band out of their garage and straight to the top, while remaining true to their look, style and sound. They get a record deal which brings fame and fortune but soon realize they are pawns of two people who want to control the youth of America. They must clear their names, even if it means losing fame and fortune.
